incident_updates.body: Start time : 13/07/2022 04:45 UTC Service impact : A fiber cut is occuring between Chicago and Beauharnois. An increase of latency between Canada and Usa may appear Ongoing actions : The fiber cut is being treated by our teams
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
Start time : 26/04/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 27/04/2022 14:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Water manifold replacement

Start time : 14/07/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 14/07/2022 09:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be carrying out a maintenance on the cooling system of the rack L113B18.

Start time : 19/07/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 19/07/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of the continuous improvement of our infrastructure, we are doing electrical works on batteries in SBG3

Start time : 19/07/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 19/07/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of the continuous improvement of our infrastructure, we are doing electrical works on batteries in SBG3

Start time : 19/07/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 19/07/2022 09:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be carrying out a maintenance on the cooling system of the rack L105B07.

Start time : 19/07/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 19/07/2022 09:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be carrying out a maintenance on the cooling system of the rack L106A07.

Start time : 07/07/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 07/07/2022 09:00 UTC Service impact : Servers in this rack will be unreachable during the maintenance Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be carrying out a maintenance on the cooling system of rack L105A09.

Start time : 20/07/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 20/07/2022 09:00 UTC Service impact : Servers will be off for 2 hours. Customers are not available during the operation Service improvement: Cooling system replacement.
Start time : 20/07/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 20/07/2022 13:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Cooling System replacement

Start time : 20/07/2022 14:00 UTC End time : 20/07/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We will make a rearrangement of network equipment. No impact is expected since the network has redundancy.

Start time : 20/07/2022 14:00 UTC End time : 20/07/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We will make a rearrangement of network equipment. No impact is expected since the network has redundancy.

Start time : 21/07/2022 05:00 UTC End time : 21/07/2022 07:00 UTC Service impact : Shutdown of the servers on rack G208A17 while the part is being replaced. Service improvement : Replacement of a remote reboot equipment
Start time : 25/07/2022 00:00 UTC End time : 25/07/2022 01:30 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: The purpose of this maintenance is to upgrade and fix error on the network equipment .

Start time : 25/06/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 28/06/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The purpose of this intervention is to replace the faulty UPS with one that is in good working order.

Start time : 25/07/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 28/07/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : Reduction of the UPS autonomy during replacement Service improvement: The objective of this maintenance is to replace used or damaged UPS batteries.

Start time : 26/07/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 26/07/2022 21:30 UTC Service impact : As part of our partner's maintenance policy, the OVHCloud Connect services at TH2 and PA3 will be interrupted for a period of 2 minutes

Start time : 27/07/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 08/08/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing a preventive maintenance on the UPS of room G117B.
Start time : 27/07/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 27/07/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : There will be a micro outage. Service improvement: The main objective of this maintenance is to test UPS batteries.
Start time : 23/08/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 23/08/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: The objective of this maintenance is to carry out annual/curative maintenance of a UPS.
Start time : 10/11/2022 07:30 UTC End time : 10/11/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We will perform load tests on the generators.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Start time : 27/06/2022 10:30 UTC End time : 21/07/2022 20:00 UTC Service impact : None Our technical teams need to do an operation on network's infrastructure. They will move near general infrastructure equipment but no impact is expected.
